name: WakeMedi launch announcement!
contents:
Hello.
We launched WakeMedi, which lets you manage morning wake-up, medication reminders, and Wake-up Call alerts that appear like real calls, all in one place.

WakeMedi is more than a simple alarm appâ€”it helps you start your daily routine more easily and enjoyably.

Key features
â° Smart wake-up alarm: reliable wake-up with flexible settings and ringtones
ðŸ’Š Medication reminders: never miss your dose
ðŸ“ž Wake-up Call: special alerts that appear like a real incoming call

Set your name/profile for a more realistic experience

You can record your own voice and use it as the alarm sound
ðŸ”— Sharing: share alarms with family/friends so you can look out for each other
ðŸ”’ Privacy: data stays on device (no server upload)

Try WakeMedi now, and let us know any ideas or issues.
WakeMedi is continuously improved based on user feedback.
For inquiries/suggestions, email us from Settings > Support.

Thank you.
